text: Amédée Antoine-Marie Grab (3 February 1930 – 19 May 2019) was a Swiss Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1954. He served as titular bishop of Canæ and auxiliary bishop of Lausanne, Geneva and Fribourg from 1987 to 1995. He then served as bishop of the diocese from 1995 to 1998. He then served as the bishop of Chur from 1995 to 2007. Grab was born in Zürich. Grab died on 19 May 2019, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Zürich Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Swiss Roman Catholic priests
title: Amédée Grab
